feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Afrikaans (lemma_afribooms)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_afribooms) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms) in Afrikaans language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_afribooms
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: af
Size: 109.9 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms
entry.summary: Description Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_afribooms) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms) in Afrikaans language. Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use PythonScalaNLU document = DocumentAssembler()\ .setInputCol("text")\ .setOutputCol("document") sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ .setInputCols(["document"])\ .setOutputCol("sentence") tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ .setOutputCol("token") lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af")\ .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ .setOutputCol("lemma") pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma]) data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text") result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data) val document = new DocumentAssembler() .setInputCol("text") .setOutputCol("document") val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx") .setInputCols("document") .setOutputCol("sentence") val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() .setInputCols("sentence") .setOutputCol("token") val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_afribooms", "af") .setInputCols("sentence", "token") .setOutputCol("lemma") val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma)) val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text") val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data) Model Information Model Name: lemma_afribooms Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Input Labels: [form] Output Labels: [lemma] Language: af Size: 109.9 KB References Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Afrikaans-AfriBooms

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Spanish (lemma_ancora)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_ancora) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Spanish-AnCora) in Spanish language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "es")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ancora", "es")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_ancora
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: es
Size: 452.6 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Spanish-AnCora https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Spanish-AnCora

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Armenian (lemma_armtdp)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_armtdp) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Armenian-ArmTDP) in Armenian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hy")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hy")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_armtdp
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: hy
Size: 210.7 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Armenian-ArmTDP https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Armenian-ArmTDP

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Armenian (lemma_armtdp)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_armtdp) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Armenian-ArmTDP) in Armenian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hyw")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer()

    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_armtdp", "hyw")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Basque (lemma_bdt)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_bdt) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Basque-BDT) in Basque language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bdt", "eu")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bdt", "eu")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_bdt
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: eu
Size: 261.5 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Basque-BDT https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Basque-BDT

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Norwegian (lemma_bokmaal)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_bokmaal) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Norwegian-Bokmaal) in Norwegian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bokmaal", "no")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bokmaal", "no")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_bokmaal
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: no
Size: 391.2 KB

References

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Portuguese (lemma_bosque)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_bosque) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Portuguese-Bosque) in Portuguese language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bosque", "pt")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_bosque", "pt")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Czech (lemma_cltt)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_cltt) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Czech-CLTT) in Czech language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_cltt", "cs")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_cltt", "cs")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_cltt
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: cs
Size: 102.8 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Czech-CLTT https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Czech-CLTT

entry.title: Lemma UD model for Estonian (lemma_edt)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_edt) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_Estonian-EDT) in Estonian language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_edt", "et")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_edt", "et")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_edt
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: et
Size: 966.9 KB

References

Model is trained on Universal Dependencies (treebank 2.9) UD_Estonian-EDT https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Estonian-EDT

entry.title: Lemma UD model for English (lemma_ewt)
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained Lemmatizer model (lemma_ewt) trained on Universal Dependencies 2.9 (UD_English-EWT) in English language.

Open in Colab Download

How to use

          
document = DocumentAssembler()\ 
    .setInputCol("text")\ 
    .setOutputCol("document")

sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")\ 
    .setInputCols(["document"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

tokenizer = Tokenizer()\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("token") 

lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ewt", "en")\ 
    .setInputCols(["sentence", "token"])\ 
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

pipeline = Pipeline(stages=[document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma])

data = spark.createDataFrame([["I love Spark NLP"]]).toDF("text")

result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)


val document = new DocumentAssembler()
    .setInputCol("text")
    .setOutputCol("document")

val sentence = SentenceDetectorDLModel.pretrained("sentence_detector_dl", "xx")
    .setInputCols("document")
    .setOutputCol("sentence")

val tokenizer = new Tokenizer() 
    .setInputCols("sentence") 
    .setOutputCol("token")

val lemma = LemmatizerModel.pretrained("lemma_ewt", "en")
    .setInputCols("sentence", "token")
    .setOutputCol("lemma")

val pipeline = new Pipeline().setStages(Array(document, sentence, tokenizer, lemma))

val data = Seq("I love Spark NLP").toDF("text")

val result = pipeline.fit(data).transform(data)

Model Information

Model Name: lemma_ewt
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.4.3+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Input Labels: [form]
Output Labels: [lemma]
Language: en
Size: 257.9 KB

References
